products.Name: Clinic Plus Strong & Long Health Shampoo
products.description: Clinic Plus believes that girls can achieve their true potential when they are raised to be strong. Mothers who empower their daughters by instilling values such as resilience and determination in them, will find that the confidence to face life’s obstacles comes naturally to them. A solid foundation is always essential and empowering – both in life, and when it comes to hair as well. Hair can only grow when it is given the strength to do so. Which is why Clinic Plus shampoos are imbibed with ingredients that nourish girls’ hair and helps give it strength to keep growing. Proteins are vital for hair growth, and milk protein is considered to be beneficial in restoring hair health so it can become strong. Treat your hair to the goodness of nutrients and protein with the Clinic Plus Strong & Long shampoo. Infused with milk proteins and multivitamins, it provides nourishment from root to tip. Suitable for all hair types, Strong & Long’s milk protein formula envelopes hair with protective nourishment. Infused with hair-friendly vitamins, it works to nourish hair from the roots up to make it strong. Nourish your hair at every wash with the Clinic Plus Strong & Long shampoo.

products.Name: Dove Intense Repair Shampoo
products.description:
Dove Intense Repair Shampoo is formulated with Keratin Actives, this Dove shampoo helps your hair to recover from damage in two different ways. The formula repairs signs of surface damage, making your hair look and feel smoother and stronger against breakage. It also penetrates the strands to provide hair nourishment deep inside, leaving you with healthier-looking, more beautiful hair, wash after wash.

Perfect For:

• Repairing damaged hair: Together with the conditioner, Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo with its Nutri-Keratin Repair Actives repairs signs of damage, so hair that's stressed out from colouring or heat damage is healthier-looking.
• Nourishment: This shampoo gently cleanses hair, so those of us with brittle hair can use it every day. And as well as instantly repairing the appearance of surface damage, used with our conditioner it nourishes at the core of strands, too, so your hair gets visibly healthier, stronger and beautiful â€“ making it a great addition to your daily routine
• Reducing breakages: Use this strengthening shampoo with your conditioner and help to reinforce your hair against breakages and fight split ends that can be caused by your daily routine

products.Name: Dove Hair Fall Rescue Shampoo
products.description:
Strengthening Dove shampoo formulated to help prevent hair fall
Reduces hair fall by up to 98 percent
Deeply nourishes fragile and weak hair from root to tip
Contains nutrilock actives. Ideal For : Men & Women
Fortifies the hair fibre from within
2 Way care to provide both instant and long-term results
